Sentencas: This paper introduces the special issue of this Journal dedicated to the International Workshop on Molten Carbonates and Related Topics, IWMC2011.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: Molten carbonates are mostly known as electrolytes in molten carbonate fuel cells (MCFCs).
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: Many advances have been reached in the last decade on the development of such electrochemical generators.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: MCFCs can be considered as a mature technology close to the real market.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: However, new materials and approaches are necessary to increase their performance and lower their costs.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: Lately, molten carbonates are also used for CO2 capture with ambitious industrial projects and a growing interest in many countries, in particular in Europe.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: Furthermore, molten carbonates are also seriously considered in direct carbon fuel cells (DCFCs), directly as electrolytes or as media to feed solid oxide fuel cells with solid carbon fuel.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: Noteworthy is the astonishing research activity on composite fuel cells combining molten carbonates with solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle

Sentencas: All these promising topics and others are briefly described emphasising their novelty.
Titulo: Strategies and new developments in the field of molten carbonates and high-temperature fuel cells in the carbon cycle
